title: Anyone on Mac getting FPS issues with 7.3?
body: The game runs, but I've noticed a lot more fps drops in busy situations. This just started when I updated to 7.3 and was fine the day before. I've lowered settings and resolutions but to no avail. I've restarted both SMC and NVRAM without a solution. Gameplay gets very choppy and stutters. Any fixes for this?

replies.body:
I've just upgraded my 2011 MBP to Sierra 10.12.3 and installed LoL patch 7.3, so I don't know what the issue is, but I'm getting the same problems.  I've got 16gb of RAM and the CPU and memory don't seem to be getting pushed to the limits (when looking at things through the Activity Monitor) but I'm struggling to keep over 20FPS in teamfights at the lowest settings for every type of windowing mode.  Would like to know if this is simply 7.3 or if it's due to Sierra.  

Are any other Mac users experiencing these low FPS problems?
Thanks

Having the same issue here on a mid-2012 rMBP. Haven't had any issues prior to this in quite some time. The whole client and game both seem to have a newly-discovered lag to them - ie. delays when buying item from shop in game or out of game (store). 

It's a shame that since OSX users represent a minority of players we get kicked to the curb. I'd bet most of us spend more than the average windows user on skins etc. Maybe if we all stopped purchasing new skins they'll pay attention?

Im getting frame drops really bad with the recent update. It doesn't matter what I'm doing in the game, still get it. I really notice it with certain champs (such as warwick). Im also losing all game music from time to time. That started in 7.2. Hopefully riot finds a solution to the problem and realizes that before they put out a patch for the game, they need to test it on all platforms and not just windows.

Does this affect all Window modes, or does it only affect specific ones? You can try swapping between them in your **VIDEO** settings in-game. Please let me know which window modes are affected by these framerate issues.

Yep, I've been having problems with 7.3 too. Tried repairing client, still the same. In busy situations like teamfights I have very low FPS and slideshow gameplay. Towards the beginning of the game it's fine, then steadily declines. Internet and ping is steady, never had serious problems with fps before 7.3 either. 

Judging by the speed of how fast riot fixes issues for mac, I wouldn't hold your breath for a fix soon unfortunately. Not a ton of mac players, so they aren't riot's priority. May be a week or more before a fix.
